Sentencas: In order to achieve the fast load following and safe transient operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine hybrid system, a novel control approach by combining the multi control loops with the coordinated protection loops is proposed in this work.
Titulo: Coordinated control approach for load following operation of SOFC-GT hybrid system

Sentencas: The coordinated protection loops can adjust the transient behavior of operation parameters on-line to avoid the undesired operation faults, such as compressor surge, reformer carbon deposition, fuel cell thermal crack and turbine blade overheat.
Titulo: Coordinated control approach for load following operation of SOFC-GT hybrid system

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the fuzzy logic theory is introduced to self-tuning the control parameters to meet the control requirements of the nonlinear time varying system.
Titulo: Coordinated control approach for load following operation of SOFC-GT hybrid system

Sentencas: The analysis in system transient behavior during load step changes operation indicates that the present work can realize parameters decoupling and eliminate the instability of SOFC-GT.
Titulo: Coordinated control approach for load following operation of SOFC-GT hybrid system

Sentencas: The proposed control strategy can reduce the SOFC current overshoot by 10.8% during the load step-down operation, meanwhile, this reduces the transient maximum temperature changing rate by almost 47.7%.
Titulo: Coordinated control approach for load following operation of SOFC-GT hybrid system

Sentencas: In addition, by changing the transient behavior of air and fuel flow, the proposed control strategy can reduce the temperature overshoot by 1.16% in load step-up operation.
Titulo: Coordinated control approach for load following operation of SOFC-GT hybrid system

Sentencas: This leads to the transient maximum temperature gradient is decreased by 0.18K/cm.
Titulo: Coordinated control approach for load following operation of SOFC-GT hybrid system
